citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:10 pm on 02-
JUNE-21.
A household member stated the licensee was not at home and would not be back for several hours.
End Section
